short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify your values and Kliqe them into action with your personal alignment score using Google search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kliqe is an innovative Chrome extension, engineered for the conscious consumer who wants their spending to mirror their values. Harnessing the power of AI and real-time data analysis, Kliqe empowers you to make informed and ethical purchasing decisions.

Here's how Kliqe works:
Personalized Alignment Scores: With Kliqe, you get a unique alignment score for each brand you search, which reflects their commitment and compatibility to your values. This score is calculated by assessing brand's financial contributions, public stances, social media activities, and more, against your own set values.

Real-Time Updates: Kliqeâ€™s alignment scores aren't static. They evolve with real-time changes in brand commitments, fund flows, and other relevant factors, providing you with the most up-to-date and accurate information to guide your purchasing decisions.

Seamless Integration: Kliqe integrates effortlessly into your browsing experience, presenting alignment scores directly within your Google search results. This enables you to quickly and conveniently evaluate a brand's compatibility with your values before making a purchase.

Informed Shopping: Kliqe amplifies your ability to promote long-term, sustainable progress through your consumer choices. By aligning your shopping habits with your values, you can actively support companies that match your beliefs.

Privacy and Data Security: At Kliqe, we respect your privacy. While we collect data from a wide range of sources, including press releases, brand statements, and social media activities, your personal information is always kept secure.

In a world where conscious consumption is more crucial than ever, Kliqe puts the power of influence back into the hands of consumers. It's time to transform your shopping experience, promote transparency, responsibility, and authenticity, and find your perfect brand match with Kliqe.
